021import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
022import net.tnemc.item.JSONHelper;
023import net.tnemc.item.component.SerialComponent;
024import net.tnemc.item.platform.ItemPlatform;
025import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
026
027import java.util.Objects;
028
029/**
030 * OminousBottleAmplifierComponent
031 *
032 * @author creatorfromhell
033 * @see <a href="https://minecraft.wiki/w/Data_component_format#ominous_bottle_amplifier">Reference</a>
034 * <p>
035 * @since 0.2.0.0
036 */
037public abstract class OminousBottleAmplifierComponent<I extends AbstractItemStack<T>, T> implements SerialComponent<I, T> {
038
039  protected int amplifier;
040
041  public OminousBottleAmplifierComponent() {
042
043  }
044
045  public OminousBottleAmplifierComponent(final int amplifier) {
046
047    this.amplifier = amplifier;
048  }
049
050  @Override
051  public String identifier() {
052    return "ominous_bottle_amplifier";
053  }
054
055  @Override
056  public JSONObject toJSON() {
057    final JSONObject json = new JSONObject();
058    json.put("amplifier", amplifier);
059    return json;
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public void readJSON(final JSONHelper json, final ItemPlatform<I, T, ?> platform) {
064    amplifier = json.getInteger("amplifier");
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public boolean similar(final SerialComponent<?, ?> component) {
069    if(!(component instanceof final OminousBottleAmplifierComponent<?, ?> other)) return false;
070    return this.amplifier == other.amplifier;
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  public int hashCode() {
075    return Objects.hash(amplifier);
076  }
077
078  public int amplifier() {
079
080    return amplifier;
081  }
082
083  public void amplifier(final int amplifier) {
084
085    this.amplifier = amplifier;
086  }
087}
